name: QrImageDecoder
summary: Decodes QR codes from raw pixel buffers.

examples.title: EXAMPLE 1

members.name: TryDecode
members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR code from a raw pixel buffer.
members.signature: static bool TryDecode(byte[] pixels, int width, int height, int stride, PixelFormat format, out QrDecoded decoded)

members.name: TryDecode
members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR code from a raw pixel buffer.
members.signature: static bool TryDecode(byte[] pixels, int width, int height, int stride, PixelFormat format, QrPixelDecodeOptions options, out QrDecoded decoded)

members.name: TryDecode
members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR code from a raw pixel buffer, with cancellation.
members.signature: static bool TryDecode(byte[] pixels, int width, int height, int stride, PixelFormat format, QrPixelDecodeOptions options, CancellationToken cancellationToken, out QrDecoded decoded)

members.name: TryDecodeAll
members.summary: Attempts to decode all QR codes from a raw pixel buffer.
members.signature: static bool TryDecodeAll(byte[] pixels, int width, int height, int stride, PixelFormat format, out QrDecoded[] decoded)

members.name: TryDecodeAll
members.summary: Attempts to decode all QR codes from a raw pixel buffer.
members.signature: static bool TryDecodeAll(byte[] pixels, int width, int height, int stride, PixelFormat format, QrPixelDecodeOptions options, out QrDecoded[] decoded)

members.name: TryDecodeImage
members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR code from common image formats (PNG/BMP/PPM/PBM/PGM/PAM/XBM/XPM/TGA).
members.signature: static bool TryDecodeImage(byte[] image, out QrDecoded decoded)

members.summary: Attempts to decode a QR code from common image formats (PNG/BMP/PPM/PBM/PGM/PAM/XBM/XPM/TGA), with diagnostics and profile options.
members.signature: static bool TryDecodeImage(byte[] image, out QrDecoded decoded, out QrPixelDecodeInfo info, QrPixelDecodeOptions options)
